website_summaries.verdict: A well-built and affordable inspection mirror that can easily fit into tight areas.
pros: Swivel neck design enables you to easily rotate the mirror's position
cons: It can be difficult to get the mirror to stay pointed at a certain angle

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. The mirror arrives in two pieces -- the ...
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. The mirror arrives in two pieces -- the circular mirror and the handle -- that have to be screwed together. Unfortunately, the threads didn't match or were stripped. The unit I received was in a blister-packed package in which the plastic cover was only stapled to the cardboard backing. So perhaps this was a return that the seller resold without verifying whether it worked. In either case, regardless of whether the manufacturer or the seller is to blame (or both), I'd return the thing in a second if it wasn't only $6. Not worth the hassle of repackaging, labeling, etc.
customer_reviews.author: cundare

customer_reviews.title: nice but defective.  Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: cool item, but the mirror is not threaded, so it cannot be connected to the telescoping handle. I would like to return it but some fine print of another makes it not eligible for return. So I guess it's headed for the trash. As nice a potential as it has as a tool I encourage you not to buy it, as it cannot be assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Gregoire

customer_reviews.title: in a good way. It reminds me of a snap-on/bluepoint mirror
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been in aircraft maintenance or doing inspections on machinery for about 25 years. Inspection mirrors have come and gone several times over. I’ve broken the mirrors on them all at some point. The telescoping handle on this mirror is robust... in a good way. It reminds me of a snap-on/bluepoint mirror. It doesn’t bend. Also it extends quite a ways past the general mirror. I’m impressed quite honestly. I’m buying another. I wish I’ve found where to buy just the mirror part though —that’s the only thing I ever seem to break.
customer_reviews.author: orson corson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent inspection mirror
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool for inspecting hard to get at places, Cars, Boats, Aircraft, . This unit has an articulating hinge that can be tightened to keep the mirror from moving around while handling. It is well made and features a nice padded handle even greasy hands can get a grip on. The length is easily adjustable holding its position well as does the mirror itself. The 2" size seems to be about right to get into nooks and crannies. I'd like to point out thie mirror itself is made of glass with the shaft a chrome plated metal Overall I think this is an excellent product, especially at the price. 5 STARS
customer_reviews.author: forbiddenapple

customer_reviews.title: A Terrific Product!
customer_reviews.text: What a well-made product! It's especially suprising to find something of this quality at this low price point! Very convenient, handy item to have for viewing hard-to-reach places. I highly recommend it! A must for the gadgeteer! One of those things you don't think you'll need til you have it, then you find it highly useful. From dental issues to that lost earring in hard to reach spots, this telescoping mirror is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Jan O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tool!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with the product. It arrived sooner than expected!! My Fiance was super excited that I got this for him. I am always being his extra set of hands when he's working on cars. Either I'm holding a mirror or a flashlight for him! This is going to help him (us) so much! The Telescope is lightweight, but very good quality! (I really couldn't believe it was this reasonable.) The neck of it REALLY adjusts to whatever angle you move it to. The telescope/ handle part actually extends out pretty far. The handle has a very good grip as well. This was exactly what he needed. I am very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Right Path

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised that so many people here complain about the fact it comes in two pieces. Yes, it does. But it takes literally one second to put the mirror and the handle together, no screwdriver needed. The handle is about a meter long. The length and the angle can be adjusted, which is useful. Overall, it's very affordable, looks good, and functions well. From this viewpoint, the product met my expectations. I wish the mirror was a little bit bigger, but, again, it really depends what you use it for. The mirror remains stable, and I like that the handle is covered with the black material that makes it more convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to check the oil level on my Yamaha V ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to check the oil level on my Yamaha V Star 1300 while I am sitting on the seat and keeping the bike level with my legs. It takes a while to know where to position the mirror to see the very small oil level window on the bike. I use a flashlight and shine it into the mirror, which effectively lights up the oil window. I think that a competing mirror with a built-in LED light would be too large to insert into the tight area to see the oil level window. That area is to the right of the gear shifter.
customer_reviews.author: T. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: While what was delivered to me works as advertised, I had misunderstood how small the whole thing would be. The actual mirror is so small that my eyes don't work well enough to really see what it is trying to show when the arm is extended. So make sure you read the specs carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan de Boinville

customer_reviews.title: Mirror is totally unstable
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is floppy, won't remain stable no matter how many times I tighten it. cost as much to return as I'd get for a refund, so I'm just trashing it. Hope to find a better product from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: kwinebold

customer_reviews.title: These are the absolute best magnets I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best magnets I have ever purchased. Allot cheaper than buying them off of the tool trucks. Strong enough to pick up my extra long ratchet. It doesn't seem to flex/bend as much as the other magnets I purchased so I can tell they are built well. I will say I had one of the 6 magnets I own come out of the telescoping unit. Maybe they didn't put enough glue? Regardless they are so cheap I just purchased another.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely essential geocaching tool!
customer_reviews.text: After GPS and flashlight, this is by far my most-used geocaching tool! It has saved me so much time already in the couple of months I've been using it. I don't see how someone could cache without it! I keep the handle clipped to the outside of a Maxpedition Janus pack, and the mirror unscrewed but available just inside the pack. A side benefit is that in certain situations this can make you look more like an "inspector", and less like a "weirdo", to muggles. Or maybe not.
customer_reviews.author: scobra77

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this was a wise item to buy. Being female and not a brut, I could not straighten my bike while trying to get a look at the oil level. I think that would be difficult for even most guys to do. So overall, I am very pleased the the mirror. It extends out great and the movement of the mirror is very good. I was able to sit on my bike and place the mirror down my the oil level window and see that it was just fine. I am going to be liking this thing for sure. Packed it in my tailbag so I have it all the time. Not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Morse

customer_reviews.title: Deliberately re-sale of a defective product!
customer_reviews.text: This was defective. They knew it and tried to re-sell it. It came in a package that was stapled back together. On purpose! Not right. There is nothing for the mirror piece to screw into. There is supposed to be a place for it to screw into but it is a solid metal piece!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and larger than expected mirror
customer_reviews.text: This little mirror works great in my shop. I use this when I work on my cars and riding lawnmower in those hard to see places. The cushion handle is a nice touch and extends very far. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Thick Neck is Better
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller mirror like this for automotive use before purchasing this one, but the neck was too thin and snapped when I tried to retract it one time. This one has a thicker neck, and, though I haven't used it extensively yet, I can already tell its thicker cross-section will make it much better against bending fatigue failure upon closing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: the tool is of good quality. The mirror is clear. I've had several of these tools, and this one is as good as I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these types of mirrors with shorter wands (extended). I find I'm only using this one now because it can be used short or all the way extended. Very solid build, glass mirror, lightweight. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: If these cost any more than they did, it wouldn't be the greatest telescoping mirror. But for the price, you can't complain much about it. It does feel fairly solid, and extends/retracts well. I like that the hinge(s) are with screws and bolts, so if they were to loosen over time, you can re-tighten them. The packaging that it came in make it look like a dollar store item, but they're far better quality. Also, there's no safe way to keep them in a tool box, so watch where and how you store it.
customer_reviews.author: WJ_YYZ

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredible for mechanics that need an eye in places where that would normally be impossible. It has saved me a lot of time under the hood and helped me find many lost bolts in places I would have spent all day looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Chace Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mirror to look into odd places while performing car repairs. The price on this one seemed right for what I was looking for. I was right. The product offers good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: nice a useable
customer_reviews.text: perfect for demonstration and good for every day use....for personal checks and for looking around the corners
customer_reviews.author: catflowerbear

customer_reviews.title: Mirror, mirror on the pole
customer_reviews.text: Worked the best of all, easy to see under pipes and hard to see spaces. Professional plumbing use. Its a mirror, works to see
customer_reviews.author: premier620

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think it is. Way too large
customer_reviews.text: Way too big. The mirror doesn’t hold it’s angle well. It takes up too much space. I was hoping for it to compact into the size of a dentist’s mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Sellas

customer_reviews.title: The "Pocket Clip" at the other end of the mirror is REALLY flimsy and breaks off easily..
customer_reviews.text: Large mirror. Look at dimensions and make sure it fits in places you want it to fit in. The "Pocket Clip" at the other end of the mirror is REALLY flimsy and breaks off easily ... not a big deal, just don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Old Guy

customer_reviews.title: Company please read!
customer_reviews.text: I just now used it for the first time and the mirror fell out and broke on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: A very handy addition to the toolbox!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is a great addition to our tool box. We have some areas in our house that are hard to see and clean effectively such as under the oven or behind the washer/dryer. This mirror makes it so much easier to make sure we aren't missing anything. It's very sturdy and stretches out long enough for all of our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: and it has not disappointed. The adjusting head has a great angle and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a whim to replace on old cracked mirror that was hard to see out of, and it has not disappointed. The adjusting head has a great angle and the telescope is nice and long. The clip on the handle is fairly worthless (who would clip this on your pocket?) but you can ignore it. This is a wonderful mirror for a lot cheaper than the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something a little on the cheap side, but functional. This is inexpensive, but definitely not cheap. It is very well made, works very smoothly (the extension is effortless - no sticking), and is solidly built. Easy to grip, and the mirror is good quality and easy to see. Everyone tool persion or homeowner needs one of these (I guarantee there will come a time when it will be indespensible) - so why not get it now at this price?
customer_reviews.author: Capricorn One

customer_reviews.title: Wow, complete junk.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror will NOT screw into the extendable handle. The threads on the mirror side are at least 1mm smaller than the mating threads on the handle. No way to mate the two. Save your money for something better. Not impressed!
customer_reviews.author: s. shelton

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed to spy on my wife from corners
customer_reviews.author: James Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Perfect large mirror
customer_reviews.text: This product stands out because the mirror is large enough that when you look at something at full extension you can see see it. Other similar products work the same but the mirror is so small that when you extend it you cannot see or read the mirror. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MrData2

customer_reviews.title: Had to super glue the mirror's connector back to the extending shaft
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a week. Had to super glue the mirror's connector back to the extending shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time and everything was there
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool i use mine all the time and love it
customer_reviews.author: James Edwards

customer_reviews.title: The textured handle helped when my hands got dirty. The mirror was just the side I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed this mirror within an hour of it arriving. I needed to see an engine sensor hidden behind the distributor of my truck. I could not have done the job without this. It seems well made. The textured handle helped when my hands got dirty. The mirror was just the side I needed. The articulating head made it possible to position it exactly. Completely functional tool at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: It came in two pieces. The handle is supposed to screw into the mirror piece. They are two different sizes and would not fit together. I would never order anything else made by this company.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Berry Jr.

customer_reviews.title: "Dad!! I know I can see myself in it and it has a lot of uses, but it's NOT a dental mirror."
customer_reviews.text: Compact and sturdy. Easy to use. What's not to like? (OK, maybe the pocket clip is a bit much, but you can take that off or leave it on. It doesn't change the fact that this works well).
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Fits in my geocache bag.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for geocaching. I haven't had to use it yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2" round mirror
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable in several different ways. Big mirror to see clearly. Soft grip handle.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: perfect for looking at the underside of a quilt while ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect for looking at the underside of a quilt while the quilt is still on the frame. can check my work as i go.
customer_reviews.author: Talien

customer_reviews.title: Very handy tool to have.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror portion loosens a bit after several use, so have to keep check of that. I use it to search for items in hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great value good design
customer_reviews.text: Very useful telescoping mirror. Really nice value for such a good design. Soft grip on the handle. Extendable rod is long to help with hard to reach areas. Mirror quality very nice, mirror swivels and is foldable which helps with storage. Mirror unscrews easily if needed. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for looking into tight places
customer_reviews.text: This thing is slick. I’ve used it multiple times to look in engine bays and in tight places.
customer_reviews.author: Keedikster

customer_reviews.title: It’s compact and holds up
customer_reviews.text: Keep this in my plate carrier vest for use as a corner peek. Has held together and not been damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty......just right for many uses
customer_reviews.text: this arrived and I was impressed by the quality and heft of the handle, etc....for the price I wasn;t expecting much, but was pleasantly surprised. I'm glad I didn't choose alternates, with smaller mirrors, or different handles.....this is just right for many uses. I bought it to work inside an acoustic guitar, but will find many uses as time goes......it's quite handy and well worth owning.
customer_reviews.author: SCS guy

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good quality and a good value.
customer_reviews.text: A little on the chincy side but has held up pretty well to everyday use so far.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Schoch

customer_reviews.title: Works good, does its job
customer_reviews.text: It does its job, its a little thicker that i thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: watsonc1994

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise very great product.
customer_reviews.text: it rotates/twists around sometimes when I wish it wouldn't. Otherwise very great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sweeny

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard-to-reach places
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for geocaching, but found it useful for other things around the house and in the car, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product. Feels cheep
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product. Feels cheep. The glass end unscrews when adjusting the angle. Had to use some threadlock to keep it from happening. The mirror edges were chipped. Not sure how long it will last but I still currently using it.
customer_reviews.author: MATHEW HALL

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when opening
customer_reviews.text: The packaging did me in. It opened easily enough, but the mirror part is not tied onto the backer card - so as soon as I cracked open the clamshell, it fell out of the package, hit the floor and cracked. Looked like it would have been a useful tool, but it was in the trash before I had it out of the package for one whole minute.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Can you see it now?
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who has ever done any automobile repair work or just worked on something mechanical, has come across the need for one of these gems. There is no substitute for a good inspection mirror. This is a replacement for the one that I had, that finally just couldn't cut it anymore! This new one, not only extends further, but it does it with style. I'm impressed! So if you have a need for an inspection mirror, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Owan

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product just ended up being bigger than I needed. We bought a similar smaller mirror
customer_reviews.author: Maldonm1

customer_reviews.title: Mirror easily detaches
customer_reviews.text: The mirror detached from the wand after 3 uses and could not be reattached. Mis-threaded? The threads no longer hold the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Jim P.

customer_reviews.title: Good lens
customer_reviews.text: The joint feels kind of flimsy, but it's held up so far. Good clarity on the reflective part though, and the handle feels good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice little mirror. Used it to do a timing belt change. Feels good in the hand. Adjustment knobs help to keep it from being too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Renner

customer_reviews.title: if you buy you are taking a chance of getting one of the bad ones. You could JB weld it but I ...
customer_reviews.text: The are some where the mirror threads are the wrong size for the handle, if you buy you are taking a chance of getting one of the bad ones. You could JB weld it but I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool for Corrections Officer.
customer_reviews.text: A great tool for any CO. Perfect for cell searches!
customer_reviews.author: ThinGreyLine

customer_reviews.title: Used for hvac
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart 1st time I used it to inspect a heat exchanger in a furnace.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyinlaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice but need a big mouth.
customer_reviews.text: Liked telescoping handle but 2” diameter is too big for dental mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm C. Tarver

customer_reviews.title: Good price for decent product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a mechanic so I need mirrors like this all the time and it’s still holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Mirror extendable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little mirror and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, works at advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the money. I've used this thing many times in only a couple of months. Wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Authority on the Subject :)

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times, but it's an inexpensive adjustable mirror. I have the feeling some of the joints will wear out eventually, but so far it's held pretty well. If you need a cheap product like this, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Valadez

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good mirror. does what it needs to do and i have no complaints with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: TbR128

customer_reviews.title: Great for Occasional Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror as I find myself needing to look in a hole in a wall or inside piping, etc. while doing projects around the house. This mirror is not top quality, but for the price if you only need it occasionally, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ingalls

customer_reviews.title: I guess you can't expect quality control on an inexpensive product.
customer_reviews.text: The thread size for the mirror was not the same as the thread size for the handle. A dab of J-B Weld and overnight makes it workable. Cheap bulk items do not receive either outgoing QA nor incoming dealer inspections. The Japanese do much better but what can one expect for the price?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It worked great until he took the lens off and tried to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it to add to my sons spy gear kit. It worked great until he took the lens off and tried to use it like a police baton. Good price... good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Cruse

customer_reviews.title: This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just, exactly, what I was looking for and found elsewhere for $16.00. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors on a stick
customer_reviews.text: It's too small for what I need. I am looking for one that is at least 4in by 6in on a long stick for being able to look under car at the Catalytic converters on each vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Grease Monkey of GA

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror all in all. It came with 2 little scratches on the mirror, but I'll keep it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This little tool seems sturdy and does what it claims to do. I use it for geocaching to prevent having to use my hands to feel places I can't see. I carry it with me each time I go out.
customer_reviews.author: P. Munroe

customer_reviews.title: Well built and perfect for checking oil on my motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: This seems sturdy and well built. It serves my needs perfectly which is to check the oil level on my motorcycle. I was getting tired of having to kneel down beside my bike while pulling it up level and trying to peer into the sight glass, now I just sit on my bike, steady it in level position with both feet on the ground, while I hold the mirror with my right hand and look at the reflection of the sight glass, much safer and easier, wish I discovered this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Big mirror
customer_reviews.text: Bigger mirror then what I would like to fit into small spaces but no the less it's good
customer_reviews.author: Billy Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: At first when buy it didn't realize size and I was kind of disappointed with the mirror size; but then I just found it way to useful and better than other things we can use for anything (make up, review of tooth, looking things in small spaces, etc)
customer_reviews.author: ECustomer

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. He said he uses it often.
customer_reviews.author: Erme

customer_reviews.title: a quality product
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it much but it seems like a very quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A

customer_reviews.title: Good to have for when you need it!
customer_reviews.text: It's one of those tools that is really handy on the occasions you need it. I don't use it often, but love it when I have a reason for it!!
customer_reviews.author: TRM

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Useful for seeing connections behind my flat screen and computer. A good size mirror. Seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Solderer

customer_reviews.title: ... result of rust But this one is made of good quality stainless steel and hasn't rusted yet
customer_reviews.text: I use these for leak detections in swimming pools I accept that I have to replace the typical ones regularly as a result of rust But this one is made of good quality stainless steel and hasn't rusted yet
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror for plumbing or other trades that need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good mirror for plumbing or other trades that need to see in tight places. Good construction for the price. I have one in my plumbing bag and going to get another for my electrical bag
customer_reviews.author: dang

customer_reviews.title: its sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: its sturdy and well built, has a great solid extension not flimsy at all. Also the mirror can unscrew if you'd like too use it as a pointing stick.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Good Reach, Good Size Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is nice. I was tired of all those mirrors that were too short or too small. This mirror works very well for getting a view behind the deepest tight areas in my engine compartment. Nice set to have around.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked just as described had to glue swivel so it didn't loosen though
customer_reviews.author: jeeptech

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: used it the first time and the little screw that screws in the handle was not the size for it but i fixed it by using masking tape on the screw and screwing it back in the handle
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: I can see 4 miles & MILES----[oops******wishful headline]
customer_reviews.text: made well, telescopes easily wish mirror aimed at floor or rear and image relayed back to this view. We can see millions of miles into space... why not 7 ft. under the coach?
customer_reviews.author: Kasha B.

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly super sturdy, but functional and worth the price. Mirro is a nice size. Four stars
customer_reviews.author: B Nelson

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: the mirror is packaged in two pieces. the thread size for the mirror is different than the handle and thus does not work. useless.
customer_reviews.author: Allen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool mirror, perfect to seeing hard to reach places in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Smith

customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what an extension mirror should. Not much to say about it. If you need to see around a corner or above an object it works great. Seems to be a quality product, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Extension Tube with Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This little device is well built and should hold up over time. It doesn't have a light which would make it perfect. As is, a nice little additional to the tool box.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish I'd payed closer attention to the size, it's a little bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: When you need one of these, you need it now. I've been extremely happy that I have this several times.
customer_reviews.author: Turbomacharged

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than i thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I read the description but the mirror on the end was still a little smaller than i thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: murphys law

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tool was received in good condition and quality of tool is as expected too.
customer_reviews.author: Nugget Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Decent for what it costs
customer_reviews.text: Kinda floppy when extended,not sure if it will hold up, but it probably will. Works great besides that. Would probably buy again, I don't use it too often.
customer_reviews.author: BlueArcher

customer_reviews.title: second set of eyes
customer_reviews.text: Very good for seeing where you can't normally see. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Not what i was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I guess I just didn't realize how small a couple inches is... I barely use it now. There are a couple random times that I've used it.. I'm in a wheelchair, so I was looking for something to help me check my skin. This does not fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made, The mirror adjustments allow for adjustment ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made, The mirror adjustments allow for adjustment to any angle you'll ever need. Arrived right on time, to.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cesena

customer_reviews.title: Mirror in a stick
customer_reviews.text: What can you say ? it's a mirror on a stick, well made and if you're gonna work on you own car you're gonna need one of these sooner or later to find a leak or look back behind or under something.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bethel

product_meta.title: SE Telescoping 2" Round Inspection Mirror - 8014TM
product_meta.description:
Style:MirrorSE is proud to present our durable, quality Telescoping Round Mirror—a great tool to have when working on detailed projects/hobbies/crafts, in the garage, checking under vehicles, seeing around corners, inspecting packages, and so much more.

Features of our Telescoping Mirror include:
(1) Round mirror diameter: 2 inches
(2) Extension: up to 33 inches, collapsed length: 6-1/2 inches
(3) Pivoting, ball-bearing swivel neck for adjusting the mirror's position to any angle
(4) Cushioned grip handle
(5) Metal clip on the handle

When fully extended, this well-balanced telescoping mirror will not go off-balance. The handle includes a clip so you can secure this tool onto your belt, pocket, shirt, etc. The pivoting, ball-bearing swivel neck allows you to custom-adjust the position of the mirror to meet your viewing requirements. You will find this mirror to be handy in countless situations as it allows you to view areas that are otherwise inaccessible or would remain hidden without it.

Important:
Avoid getting counterfeit items. Genuine SE products come with our SE logo on the packaging.

SE products are quality items for extremely reasonable prices. SE is committed to providing the customer with the best source for value possible on the market. You will enjoy the quality, function and usefulness this SE 8014TM Telescoping 2" Round Inspection Mirror has to offer every time you reach for it.

SE is a registered trademark protected by US Trademark Law.
feature_bullets: Swivel neck to adjust the mirror's position
Strong and sturdy black cushion grip handle with metal clip
Great for inspections, detailed projects, and more
